ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New to EQ and can't get it started!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you defragged your hard drive lately? I have had some instances in games, DAOC, Warcraft III, where the game would crash or drop to the desktop and
ygData.messageBody:
Have you defragged your hard drive lately? I have had some instances in games, DAOC, Warcraft III, where the game would crash or drop to the desktop and defragging the drive helped for a while. I have actually been having problems with EQ dropping unexpectedly lately now that I think about it. I have yet to defrag my HD but I know I haven't done it in over a month, so it could be the problem.
----- Original Message -----
From: muddywag
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 07, 2002 2:26 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] New to EQ and can't get it started!!!

Hello.  I bought eq today along with a game card.  I installed it,
went to new account, and when I click it it bounces me to the
desktop.  i dried disabling my firewall, soundcard, starting with
all unnecessary processes disabled.  uninstalled/installed many
times.  checked for irq and I found that the cable modem network
cark was sharing 12 with the onboard sound, tried moving the network
card and ended up having to reactivate xp!  As it stands, I've yet
to set foot in Norrath.
I registered at the Station, and tried to use the tech bulliten
board, but it won't let me post, says that I need to me a regisered
user-- I thought I was!!
anyways, that's why I'm here.  PLEASE HELP!!  I can't wait to play
my new game!!!
Thanks
Dan


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
